languages.text: "Почитатели Хаоса. Чаще всего агенты Трона сталкиваются с одиночками, действующими в толпе. Безумные проповедники и кликуши, вещающие о скором конце света. Падение кометы, восстание мутантов, нашествие чудовищ... каждый раз — новая причина, почему люди должны трепетать и падать ниц. Немало сил и крови верных слуг Золотого Трона было потрачено на то, чтобы вскрыть взаимосвязь между этими еретиками".

"Chaos worshippers. Most often agents of the Throne run into lone renegades stirring up the rabble. Insane prophets and hysteric visionaries preaching the end of days. A passing comet, a mutant rebellion, an onslaught of monsters... Each time they come up with a new reason why people should prostrate themselves and quiver in fear. Much effort and the blood of those loyal to the Golden Throne were spent before we established the connection between those heretics."
languages.original_text: "Почитатели Хаоса. Чаще всего агенты Трона сталкиваются с одиночками, действующими в толпе. Безумные проповедники и кликуши, вещающие о скором конце света. languages.text: «Adoradores del Caos. En general, los agentes del Trono nos encontramos con renegados aislados que incitan a la chusma. Profetas desquiciados y visionarios histéricos que proclaman el fin de los días. El paso de un cometa, una rebelión mutante, una horda de monstruos... siempre encuentran una nueva razón por la que la gente debería arrodillarse y temblar. Los fieles al Trono Dorado tuvimos que dedicar sangre y esfuerzo para poder establecer un vínculo entre todos esos herejes».
languages.original_text: "Chaos worshippers. Most often agents of the Throne run into lone renegades stirring up the rabble. Insane prophets and hysteric visionaries preaching the end of days. A passing comet, a mutant rebellion, an onslaught of monsters... Each time they come up with a new reason why people should prostrate themselves and quiver in fear. Much effort and the blood of those loyal to the Golden Throne were spent before we established the connection between those heretics."

languages.text: “他们是混沌的崇拜者。黄金王座的特使经常会遇到打算煽动暴民的叛乱分子。他们是一群疯狂的预言家和歇斯底里的幻想家，到处宣扬世界末日，像是彗星撞击，或是变种人叛乱，或是怪物来袭之类的……每次他们都会想出新的借口，让普罗大众匍匐在地，在恐惧中颤抖。许多忠于黄金王座的人们付出了汗水与鲜血的代价，才帮助我们确定了那些异端分子之间的联系。”
languages.original_text: "Chaos worshippers. Most often agents of the Throne run into lone renegades stirring up the rabble. Insane prophets and hysteric visionaries preaching the end of days. A passing comet, a mutant rebellion, an onslaught of monsters... Each time they come up with a new reason why people should prostrate themselves and quiver in fear. Much effort and the blood of those loyal to the Golden Throne were spent before we established the connection between those heretics."

traits.locale_text: “他们是混沌的崇拜者。黄金王座的特使经常会遇到打算煽动暴民的叛乱分子。他们是一群疯狂的预言家和歇斯底里的幻想家，到处宣扬世界末日，像是彗星撞击，或是变种人叛乱，或是怪物来袭之类的……每次他们都会想出新的借口，让普罗大众匍匐在地，在恐惧中颤抖。许多忠于黄金王座的人们付出了汗水与鲜血的代价，才帮助我们确定了那些异端分子之间的联系。”

languages.text: 「混沌崇拝者。玉座の使いは、民衆を煽る孤高の背教者に遭遇しやすい。頭のおかしい預言者や、終末を語るヒステリックで想像力の逞しい輩。彗星の通過だの、変異体の反乱だの、モンスターの襲来だの…奴らは毎度、人間がひれ伏して恐怖に震えるべき新しい理由を思いつく。そういう異端者同士の関係を突き止めるまでに、我達は大いなる努力と、黄金の玉座に忠誠を誓う多くの者の血を捧げたのです」
languages.original_text: "Chaos worshippers. Most often agents of the Throne run into lone renegades stirring up the rabble. Insane prophets and hysteric visionaries preaching the end of days. A passing comet, a mutant rebellion, an onslaught of monsters... Each time they come up with a new reason why people should prostrate themselves and quiver in fear. Much effort and the blood of those loyal to the Golden Throne were spent before we established the connection between those heretics."

traits.locale_text: 「混沌崇拝者。玉座の使いは、民衆を煽る孤高の背教者に遭遇しやすい。頭のおかしい預言者や、終末を語るヒステリックで想像力の逞しい輩。彗星の通過だの、変異体の反乱だの、モンスターの襲来だの…奴らは毎度、人間がひれ伏して恐怖に震えるべき新しい理由を思いつく。そういう異端者同士の関係を突き止めるまでに、我達は大いなる努力と、黄金の玉座に忠誠を誓う多くの者の血を捧げたのです」

languages.text: "Anhänger des Chaos. In der Regel stoßen Agenten des Throns auf einzelne Abtrünnige, die das gemeine Volk aufwiegeln. Verrückte Propheten und hysterische Visionäre, die den Untergang des Universums predigen. Ein vorbeiziehender Komet, eine Rebellion von Mutanten, ein Massaker durch Monster ... Sie finden ständig neue Gründe, warum sich die Menschen in den Staub werfen und vor Angst zittern sollten. Es bedurfte großer Anstrengungen und des Blutes zahlloser Anhänger des Goldenen Throns, ehe wir die Verbindung zwischen diesen Ketzern herstellen konnten."
languages.original_text: "Chaos worshippers. Most often agents of the Throne run into lone renegades stirring up the rabble. Insane prophets and hysteric visionaries preaching the end of days. A passing comet, a mutant rebellion, an onslaught of monsters... Each time they come up with a new reason why people should prostrate themselves and quiver in fear. Much effort and the blood of those loyal to the Golden Throne were spent before we established the connection between those heretics."

traits.locale_text: "Anhänger des Chaos. In der Regel stoßen Agenten des Throns auf einzelne Abtrünnige, die das gemeine Volk aufwiegeln. Verrückte Propheten und hysterische Visionäre, die den Untergang des Universums predigen. Ein vorbeiziehender Komet, eine Rebellion von Mutanten, ein Massaker durch Monster ... Sie finden ständig neue Gründe, warum sich die Menschen in den Staub werfen und vor Angst zittern sollten. Es bedurfte großer Anstrengungen und des Blutes zahlloser Anhänger des Goldenen Throns, ehe wir dir Verbindung zwischen diesen Ketzern herstellen konnten."

languages.text: « Ce sont des adorateurs du Chaos. La plupart du temps, les agents du Trône tombent sur des renégats isolés qui cherchent à semer la panique parmi le peuple, comme des prophètes fous ou des visionnaires hystériques qui annoncent la fin des temps. Une comète de passage, une rébellion de mutants, une attaque de monstres... Chaque fois, ils trouvent un nouveau prétexte pour inciter les gens à se prosterner et à trembler de peur. Les partisans du Trône d'Or ont dû fournir beaucoup d'efforts, et même verser leur sang, avant que nous ne parvenions à faire le lien entre ces hérétiques. »
languages.original_text: "Chaos worshippers. Most often agents of the Throne run into lone renegades stirring up the rabble. Insane prophets and hysteric visionaries preaching the end of days. A passing comet, a mutant rebellion, an onslaught of monsters... Each time they come up with a new reason why people should prostrate themselves and quiver in fear. Much effort and the blood of those loyal to the Golden Throne were spent before we established the connection between those heretics."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont des adorateurs du Chaos. La plupart du temps, les agents du Trône tombent sur des renégats isolés qui cherchent à semer la panique parmi le peuple, comme des prophètes fous ou des visionnaires hystériques qui annoncent la fin des temps. Une comète de passage, une rébellion de mutants, une attaque de monstres... Chaque fois, ils trouvent un nouveau prétexte pour inciter les gens à se prosterner et à trembler de peur. Les partisans du Trône d'Or ont dû fournir beaucoup d'efforts, et même verser leur sang, avant que nous ne parvenions à faire le lien entre ces hérétiques. »

languages.text: "Kaos'a taparlar. Taht ajanları genellikle halkı galeyana getirmeye çalışan yalnız muhaliflerle karşı karşıyadır. Her şeyin sonunun geldiğini anlatıp duran deli kâhinler, histerik hayalperestler işte. Geçmekte olan bir kuyruklu yıldız, bir mutant isyanı, bir yaratık katliamı... Her seferinde insanların diz çöküp korkuyla titremesini gerektirecek yeni bir sebep bulurlar. Bu kâfirler arasındaki bağı kurabilmek için Altın Taht'ın nice sadık hizmetkârının ter ve kan dökmesi gerekti."
languages.original_text: "Chaos worshippers. Most often agents of the Throne run into lone renegades stirring up the rabble. Insane prophets and hysteric visionaries preaching the end of days. A passing comet, a mutant rebellion, an onslaught of monsters... Each time they come up with a new reason why people should prostrate themselves and quiver in fear. Much effort and the blood of those loyal to the Golden Throne were spent before we established the connection between those heretics."

traits.locale_text: "Kaos'a taparlar. Taht ajanları genellikle halkı galeyana getirmeye çalışan yalnız muhaliflere denk gelirler. Her şeyin sonunun geldiğini anlatıp duran deli kâhinler ve histerik hayalperestler. Geçmekte olan bir kuyruklu yıldız, bir mutant isyanı, bir yaratık katliamı... Her seferinde insanların neden diz çöküp korkuyla titremesi gerektiğine dair yeni bir sebep bulurlar. Bu kâfirler arasındaki bağı kurabilmek için Altın Taht'ın nice sadık hizmetkârının emeklerinin ve kanının harcanması gerekti."
